message.content: This question requires knowledge about astronomical bodies and their effects on Earth. The sun is larger than the human planet and is responsible for the cycles of day and night. The moon does affect the tides, but it is not larger than Earth. The ocean is not an astronomical body and does not cause day and night. Mars is a planet, but it is smaller than Earth and does not cause day and night.
